java/liquibase/database/SybaseDatabase.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00006 
00007 import java.sql.Connection;
00008 
00009 public class SybaseDatabase extends MSSQLDatabase {
00010 
00011 
00012     public SybaseDatabase() {
00013         systemTablesAndViews.add("sysquerymetrics");        
00014     }
00015 
00016     public String getProductName() {
00017         return "Sybase SQL Server";
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getTypeName() {
00021         return "sybase";
00022     }
00023     
00024     public void setConnection(Connection connection) {
00025         super.setConnection(new SybaseConnectionDelegate(connection));
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00029         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:sybase")) {
00030             return "com.sybase.jdbc3.jdbc.SybDriver";
00031         } else if (url.startsWith("jdbc:jtds:sybase")) {
00032             return "net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver";
00033         }
00034         return null;
00035     }
00036     
00041     public boolean supportsDDLInTransaction() {
00042         return false;
00043     }
00044     
00045     protected SqlStatement getCreateChangeLogSQL() {
00046         return new RawSqlStatement(("CREATE TABLE "+escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())+" (ID VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, " +
00047                 "AUTHOR VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, " +
00048                 "FILENAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, " +
00049                 "DATEEXECUTED " + getDateTimeType() + " NOT NULL, " +
00050                 "MD5SUM VARCHAR(32) NULL, " +
00051                 "DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255) NULL, " +
00052                 "COMMENTS VARCHAR(255) NULL, " +
00053                 "TAG VARCHAR(255) NULL, " +
00054                 "LIQUIBASE VARCHAR(10) NULL, " +
00055                 "PRIMARY KEY(ID, AUTHOR, FILENAME))"));
00056     }
00057 
00058     protected SqlStatement getCreateChangeLogLockSQL() {
00059         return new RawSqlStatement(("CREATE TABLE "+escapeTableName(getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabaseChangeLogLockTableName())+" (ID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, LOCKED " + getBooleanType() + " NOT NULL, LOCKGRANTED " + getDateTimeType() + " NULL, LOCKEDBY VARCHAR(255) NULL)"));
00060     }
00061

00093     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00094         String dbProductName = getDatabaseProductName(conn);
00095         return "Adaptive Server Enterprise".equals(dbProductName) ||
00096             "sql server".equals(dbProductName);
00097     }
00098 
00099     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00100         return true;
00101     }
00102 
00103 }
